```{r}
# Load required package
library(Biostrings)


# Given DNA strings
dna_strings <- c("",
"",
"
>Rosalind_",
"",
"",
"",
"",
"","")

# Convert strings into a matrix
matrix <- matrix(unlist(strsplit(dna_strings, "")), nrow = length(dna_strings), byrow = TRUE)

# Create profile matrix
profile_matrix <- matrix(0, nrow = 4, ncol = ncol(matrix), dimnames = list(c("A", "C", "G", "T"), NULL))
for (i in 1:ncol(matrix)) {
  profile_matrix["A", i] <- sum(matrix[, i] == "A")
  profile_matrix["C", i] <- sum(matrix[, i] == "C")
  profile_matrix["G", i] <- sum(matrix[, i] == "G")
  profile_matrix["T", i] <- sum(matrix[, i] == "T")
}

# Generate consensus string
consensus <- character(ncol(matrix))
for (i in 1:ncol(matrix)) {
  max_count <- max(profile_matrix[, i])
  consensus[i] <- names(profile_matrix[, i])[which.max(profile_matrix[, i])]
}

# Print results
cat("Consensus string:\n", paste(consensus, collapse = ""), "\n\n")
print(profile_matrix)

```
